summary: Provides a parser that reads Nginx configuration files, follows include directives, normalizes paths, and constructs an in‑memory model of server blocks. The model can be queried and modified to add, remove, or update virtual‑host directives and SSL settings, supporting Certbot's automation of certificate deployment.
business_intent: Automate the management of Nginx virtual‑host configurations so that Certbot can reliably install, renew, and configure SSL/TLS certificates without manual editing of server files.
